meanings.sent1: The pack of wolves roamed the forest together.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of wolves at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The wolves howled at the full moon, creating a spooky atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the wolves symbolized danger and cunning.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wolves hunting in the snow stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: Wolves: a carnivorous mammal of the dog family, Canidae, especially the gray wolf, Canis lupus, of North America
meanings.sent1: The wolves hunted in packs to catch their prey.
meanings.sent2: The howling of wolves echoed through the night.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous wolves played a game of hide and seek in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The lone wolf in the group stood out with its unique markings.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the wolves running freely in the wilderness was breathtaking.
